links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,11
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); n=0; for (m=1, 1172, a=m*3^m - 1; if (isprime(a), write("b060353.txt", n++, " ", a)); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 04 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Mar 31 2001
extensions: More terms from _William Rex Marshall_, Apr 01 2001
